item.title: Why "Make it in Excel" Isn't All Bad
X3 Advice
item.description: Personal repository for interesting advice I’ve heard following the If you do X 3 times, then do Y pattern. If you copy and paste code 3+ times, write a function If you copy and paste a function 3+ times, write a package — Hadley Wickham If you give in-person advice 3+ times, write a blog post — David Robinson
